text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov Hahaha, Trump isn't fighting anything, he's a lying criminal himself. Can you imagine that the American people are going to allow Trump to take over the COVID-19 numbers in this country for his own personal use to lie to the American people? Trump is the criminal.
